input.sentences: this boy from thailand was celebrating the birth of his new brother .
he rode a horse with his sister to the hopsital .
there they saw their new baby brother .
the boy 's sisters were so happy to have another sibling .
the entire family posed for pics with their new brother .
output.sentences: The boy in Thailand was ready to start the celebration.
His sister rode a horse with another child.
His baby brother was happy, too.
The girls were excited for the celebration, too.
They were able to take a nice family picture.
